about-us.title: Know our history
about-us.sec-1: was born with a clear purpose: to transform the way travel is experienced. We didn't want to simply sell tickets or reservations; we wanted to design experiences that would remain forever in the memory. From the beginning, we set out to accompany each traveler in the creation of unique memories, with the certainty that every detail will turn out the way you dreamed it - or even better.
about-us.sec-2: Although Travel Design took shape as such in 2017, the experience behind us has much deeper roots. Our founder has been dedicated to the world of travel for more than three decades, perfecting the art of anticipating what the traveler needs, even before they ask for it. That trajectory, built with dedication, sacrifice and passion, is the foundation of everything we are today.
about-us.sec-3: We know that a trip is much more than a destination. It is the illusion that begins from the moment it is imagined, the excitement of the preparations, and the tranquility of knowing that everything is under control. That's why we focus on creating worry-free trips, where each itinerary is tailor-made, taking care of every detail with precision and anticipating every need.
about-us.sec-4: At Travel Design we live and breathe luxury, but not as a synonym of ostentation, but as a way of traveling with purpose, with comfort, with authenticity. We understand luxury as the art of traveling well: without improvisations, with personalized attention and experiences that cannot be found in a common catalog.
about-us.sec-5: What sets us apart is the spirit in which we work. We don't sell trips; we design experiences. And behind every trip, there are hours of dedication, years of knowledge, and a deep commitment to our travelers. Because every itinerary that leaves our hands, carries a little piece of our history, our passion and why we started this journey.
about-us.sec-6: If you've ever dreamed of a trip that feels as much your own as your story, you're in the right place. Here, every experience is designed with you and for you.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy and Data Protection Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: At Travel Design (hereinafter, “we” or “the company”), we protect the privacy and personal data of our users in accordance with the Federal Law on Protection of Personal Data Held by Private Parties (LFPDPPP) and its Regulations. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your information when you interact with our website www.traveldesign.com.mx.
privacyPolicy.section1Content: The data controller is Travel Design, located at Av. 50 metros 100 Torre III Piso 6 Oficina 602 Villas del Lago, Cuernavaca, Morelos, C.P. 62374. For any questions or requests related to privacy, contact us at info@traveldesign.com.mx.
privacyPolicy.section2Intro: We collect the following personal data when you interact with our website or services:
privacyPolicy.section2Item1: Identification data: Name, email, phone number.
privacyPolicy.section2Item2: Browsing data: IP address, browser, operating system, and visited pages.
privacyPolicy.section2Item3: Cookies and tracking technologies: To enhance user experience and personalize content.
privacyPolicy.section3Intro: Personal data will be used to:

privacyPolicy.section3Item3: Personalize your experience on our website.
privacyPolicy.section3Item4: Comply with applicable legal and regulatory obligations.
privacyPolicy.section4Title: 4. ARCO Rights (Access, Rectification, Cancellation, and Opposition)
privacyPolicy.section4Intro: As the data subject, you may exercise your ARCO rights at any time by sending a request to info@traveldesign.com.mx with the following information:
privacyPolicy.section4Item2: Clear description of the right you wish to exercise.
privacyPolicy.section4Item3: Email address or means to receive a response.
privacyPolicy.section4Note: We will respond to your request within a maximum of 20 business days in accordance with the LFPDPPP.
privacyPolicy.section5Intro: We do not share or sell your personal information to third parties without your consent, except in the following cases:
privacyPolicy.section5Item1: Service providers that help us operate our website and conduct business activities.
privacyPolicy.section5Item2: Government authorities when required by law.
privacyPolicy.section6Title: 6. Use of Cookies and Tracking Technologies
privacyPolicy.section6Intro: We use cookies to improve the user experience and analyze site usage. You can disable cookies through your browser settings.
privacyPolicy.section7Intro: We implement administrative, technical, and physical security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, loss, or alteration.
privacyPolicy.section8Intro: We reserve the right to modify this policy at any time. Any changes will be notified on our website www.traveldesign.com.mx.
privacyPolicy.section9Intro: For questions about this Privacy Policy, contact us at info@traveldesign.com.mx or at our address: Av. 50 metros 100 Torre III Piso 6 Oficina 602 Villas del Lago, Cuernavaca, Morelos, C.P. 62374.
